data.eml:eml: Two new species of freshwater Macrostomum (Rhabditophora: Macrostomorpha) found in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Antai (2017): Two new species of freshwater Macrostomum (Rhabditophora: Macrostomorpha) found in China. Zootaxa 4329 (3): 267-280, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4329.3.5
